sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './HomePage.css'; const posts = [ { id: 1, title: 'Fashion Trends', description: 'Discover the latest in fashion and stay ahead of the trends.', brief: 'Stay stylish with the latest fashion trends for all seasons.', content: `

Summer Trends

Explore the vibrant and colorful fashion trends for summer, including lightweight fabrics, bold prints, and breezy styles that keep you cool and chic.

Winter Wear

Stay warm and stylish with winter wear essentials. Discover cozy knitwear, fashionable coats, and layering techniques to keep you comfortable and trendy.

Spring Highlights

Embrace the freshness of spring with floral patterns, pastel colors, and lightweight jackets. Learn how to transition your wardrobe seamlessly from winter to spring.

`, image: '/assets/images/fashion.jpg' }, { id: 2, title: 'Beauty Trends', description: 'Explore top skincare products, makeup trends, and haircare products.', brief: 'Learn about the latest in skincare, makeup, and haircare.', content: `

Top Skincare Products

Discover the top skincare products that will keep your skin glowing and healthy. From cleansers to moisturizers, find the best products for your skincare routine.

Makeup Trends

Stay updated with the latest makeup trends. Learn about bold eye makeup, natural looks, and the best products to achieve these trends.

Haircare Products

Find out which haircare products are must-haves for maintaining healthy and beautiful hair. From shampoos to styling products, discover what works best for your hair type.

`, image: '/assets/images/beauty.jpg' }, { id: 3, title: 'Lifestyle', description: 'Discover tips on healthy living, travel destinations, and home decor.', brief: 'Explore the best tips for a healthy and stylish lifestyle.', content: `

Healthy Living

Learn about the best practices for maintaining a healthy lifestyle. From balanced diets to regular exercise, discover tips to keep you in top shape.

Travel Destinations

Explore the most beautiful and exciting travel destinations around the world. Get tips on where to go, what to see, and how to make the most of your travels.

Home Decor

Discover the latest trends in home decor. From minimalist designs to cozy interiors, get inspired to decorate your home in style.

`, image: '/assets/images/lifestyle.jpg' } ]; const HomePage = () => { return (

Blog Posts

{posts.map(post => (

{post.title}

{post.brief}

Read More
))}
); }; export default HomePage;
